meanings.definition: A television program that documents real-life events in a soap opera style.
meanings.sent1: The docusoap we watched last night showed a family's daily life drama.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching docusoaps because they feel like real-life soap operas.
meanings.sent3: The docusoap about penguins trying to find their lost fish was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a docusoap, with unexpected twists and turns every day.
meanings.sent5: The docusoap painted a vivid picture of the struggles faced by the characters.

meanings.definition: To film or produce a docusoap.
meanings.sent1: The director decided to docusoap the behind-the-scenes of the movie set.
meanings.sent2: She loves to docusoap her travels to share with her friends.
meanings.sent3: We should docusoap our cooking adventures and make it a fun series.
meanings.sent4: His camera skills allow him to docusoap even the most mundane activities creatively.
meanings.sent5: The team plans to docusoap the local community's efforts to go green.
